name: forget me souma
description:
Submission for Horrors for my Valentine.

You're an averagely normal human dating Souma (they/them), a writer (who wouldn't really call themselves a writer) with peculiar behavior and claims not to be the same kind with you. Things can't possibly go right, but they still love you regardless!

  

Aside from Souma, you will encounter some other... weirdos as well, in which both of them wouldn't really allow Souma to have their way.

Future update if ever and updating post-deadline is legal, estimated delivery late February
  • Theme park sub-areas
  • More books to elaborate whatever I'm trying to say here
  • More screen for side characters I want to show...
  • Overall adjustment and addition for art and GUI
  • U... updated and properly expanded writings? I don't know, a lot of these are really rushed
